ygData.subject: RE: Clerics and Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Lets hope with the expansion that Verant adds some new bard skills and increases the skill caps.  You would think that at a certain point in our career, after
ygData.messageBody:
Lets hope with the expansion that Verant adds some new bard skills and
increases the skill caps. You would think that at a certain point in our
career, after watching our warrior, paladins, and ranger friends fight all
the time, that we would have learned some new fighting techniques.

Bard: "Mr. Ranger, that was cool how you parried that last blow with your
off-hand weapon. Can you show me how you did that?"
Ranger: "Mr. Bard, without a doubt I can show you how to do it, but since
you are learning late in your career you could never hope to become as good
with the technique as I am"
Bard: "Thats not a problem, if I at least learn the basics I'm certain it
will help me out somewhere down the road."

Galtin of E'ci


> That clerics are weak at melee is not the point. The point is
> that all the classes that have weak defensive skills have
> options other than meleeing - root/nuke or pet/nuke. The
> classes that have to melee have strong defensive skills.
> Except us.
>
> I suppose we can always kite...
>
> --
> John H. Kim
